0.text: Innate: Neeko is offered a selection of allied  champions to take on their appearance. She can choose a new champion to switch her disguise or select herself to deactivate her disguise, placing Inherent Glamour on a 2-second cooldown.
0.html: Innate: Neeko is offered a selection of allied champions to take on their appearance. She can choose a new champion to switch her disguise or select herself to deactivate her disguise, placing Inherent Glamour on a 2-second cooldown.
markedPassages: champions

1.text: While disguised, Neeko can use basic attacks while keeping her form. Taking direct damage from enemy  champions or using a damaging ability, summoner spell, or item active puts Inherent Glamour on full  cooldown.
1.html: While disguised, Neeko can use basic attacks while keeping her form. Taking direct damage from enemy champions or using a damaging ability, summoner spell, or item active puts Inherent Glamour on full  cooldown.
markedPassages: champions
cooldown

2.text: Neeko cannot activate Inherent Glamour while she is unable to cast abilities.
2.html: Neeko cannot activate Inherent Glamour while she is unable to cast abilities.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Neeko cannot activate Inherent Glamour while she is unable to cast abilities.

0.text: Active: Neeko tosses a seed that blooms at the target location, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Neeko tosses a seed that blooms at the target location, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: If the bloom kills an enemy or hits a  champion or large  monster, it will bloom again after 0.75 seconds to deal magic damage. This may occur up to 2 times per cast.
1.html: If the bloom kills an enemy or hits a champion or large monster, it will bloom again after 0.75 seconds to deal magic damage. This may occur up to 2 times per cast.
markedPassages: champion
monster

0.text: Passive: Neeko's basic attacks  on-hit generate a stack of Shapesplitter, stacking up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, her next basic attack on-attack is empowered to consume them all to become  non-projectile, deal bonus magic damage and grant her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.
0.html: Passive: Neeko's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Shapesplitter, stacking up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, her next basic attack on-attack is empowered to consume them all to become non-projectile, deal bonus magic damage and grant her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.
markedPassages: on-hit
non-projectile
bonus movement speed

1.text: Active: Neeko creates a  clone of her  current form, after which they both instantly become  invisible for 0.5 seconds and gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
1.html: Active: Neeko creates a clone of her current form, after which they both instantly become invisible for 0.5 seconds and gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
markedPassages: clone
current form
invisible

2.text: The clone lasts for 3 seconds, and starts running a fixed distance in the target direction. It is  untargetable to allies and for the first 0.5 seconds of its lifespan to enemies.
2.html: The clone lasts for 3 seconds, and starts running a fixed distance in the target direction. It is untargetable to allies and for the first 0.5 seconds of its lifespan to enemies.
markedPassages: untargetable

0.text: Active: Neeko slings a magical spiral in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  roots them for a duration.
0.html: Active: Neeko slings a magical spiral in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and roots them for a duration.
markedPassages: roots

1.text: If the spiral hits at least one enemy, it grows in size and its speed and root duration is increased.
1.html: If the spiral hits at least one enemy, it grows in size and its speed and root duration is increased.

0.text: Active: Neeko winds up spiritual essence over 1.25 seconds and highlights an area around herself, which is visible to enemies unless Neeko is  disguised.
0.html: Active: Neeko winds up spiritual essence over 1.25 seconds and highlights an area around herself, which is visible to enemies unless Neeko is disguised.
markedPassages: disguised

1.text: After winding up, the cast time begins and Neeko leaps into the air, granting herself a  shield for 2 seconds that is increased for each nearby enemy  champion.
1.html: After winding up, the cast time begins and Neeko leaps into the air, granting herself a shield for 2 seconds that is increased for each nearby enemy champion.
markedPassages: shield
champion

2.text: When the cast time ends, she lands to emit a burst of energy that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  stuns them for 1.25 seconds.
2.html: When the cast time ends, she lands to emit a burst of energy that deals magic damage to nearby enemies and stuns them for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: stuns
